stories.original_headline: Next gen cancer drug shows surprising anti aging power
stories.original_summary: A next-generation drug tested in yeast was found to extend lifespan and slow aging by influencing a major growth-control pathway. Researchers also uncovered an unexpected role for agmatinases, enzymes that help keep this pathway in balance. Diet and gut microbes may affect aging more than expected b
stories.fantasy_headline: Elixir of Long Life Discovered by Esteemed Alchemists!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Alchemists' Guild has crafted a new potent elixir. Tested on small creatures, it appears to grant a longer life and ward off the creeping infirmities of old age. This magical draught affects the body's vital life flow, suggesting that daily fare and inner spirits hold more secrets to vitality than once thought.

stories.original_headline: Scientists reveal a powerful heart boost hidden in everyday foods
stories.original_summary: Regular consumption of polyphenol-rich foods like tea, coffee, berries, nuts, and whole grains may significantly support long-term heart health. A decade-long study of more than 3,100 adults found that those who consistently ate polyphenol-packed diets had healthier blood pressure and cholesterol levels.
stories.fantasy_headline: Everyday Provisions Grant Robust Hearts and Long Lives!
stories.fantasy_story: Wise scholars and healers have unveiled a wondrous truth: eating blessed provisions like herbal teas, potent brews, berries, nuts, and hearty grains regularly can grant robust hearts. A long study showed those who partook in nature's bounty often kept calm humors and clear flows within their veins, ensuring long-term vitality.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Chronicler's Scroll of Wondrous Gifts for the Midwinter Feast.
stories.fantasy_story: The Midwinter Feast often arrives quicker than a nimble forest sprite! To avoid a frantic search for suitable gifts for your kin, the Grand Chronicler has prepared a special scroll. This enchanted ledger reveals many fine wares to ensure the festive spirit remains high and worries stay low.
